item.name: üîê Authentication & Registration
item.description: Complete authentication system for all user roles

request.description:
**USER Role Capabilities:**
- Browse and search events
- Join free and paid events
- Make payments for paid events
- Leave reviews after attending
- Manage personal profile
- View booking history
- Leave events before they start

**HOST Role Capabilities:**
- Create and manage events
- Set event pricing and participant limits
- View participant lists and details
- Update event information
- Cancel events (if no paid bookings)
- Receive and view reviews
- Track earnings from paid events
- Also has all USER capabilities

**ADMIN Role Capabilities:**
- Full platform access and control
- Manage all users (view, update, delete)
- Promote users to hosts or demote hosts
- Manage all events (view, update, delete any event)
- View platform statistics and analytics
- Moderate reviews and content
- View all bookings and transactions
- Handle disputes and refunds
